data.title: Blood Compatibility
data.statement:
Given [[n]] donors, and the [[blood_type]] and [[age]] of the patient, you must print the Most Compatible Donor and Other Compatible Donors

<<Notes:>>
Compatible donors most have the same blood group as the patient
Most Compatible Donor is the person with least age difference with the patient and is a compatible donor
Other Compatible Donors should be sorted by absolute difference with patient's age.

testCases.title: Normal
testCases.testIn:
5
Johnathan A+ 35
Lord.Jay O+ 43
OLDman B+ 78
YOUNGkid A+ 13
Terminator B+ 50
A+ 14
testCases.testOut:
MOST COMPATIBLE DONOR : YOUNGkid
OTHER COMPATIBLE DONORS :
Johnathan

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:
5
Johnathan A+ 35
Lord.Jay O+ 43
OLDman B+ 78
YOUNGkid A+ 13
Terminator B+ 50
B+ 14
testCases.testOut:
MOST COMPATIBLE DONOR : Terminator
OTHER COMPATIBLE DONORS :
OLDman

testCases.title: Medium
testCases.testIn:
5
Johnathan A+ 35
Lord.Jay O+ 43
OLDman B+ 78
YOUNGkid A+ 13
Terminator AB 50
O+ 198

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
5
Johnathan A+ 35
Lord.Jay O+ 43
OLDman B+ 78
YOUNGkid A+ 13
Terminator AB 50
O+ 14

testCases.title: Large
testCases.testIn:
26
A A+ 1
B A+ 2
C A+ 3
D A+ 4
E A+ 5
F A+ 6
G A+ 7
H A+ 8
I A+ 9
J A 10
K A 1
L A 2
M A 2
N A 3
O A 4
P A 5
Q B 4
R AB 6
T O 100
S A 90
U O 90
V AB 60
W A+ 35
X A- 20
Y AB 25
Z A 2
A+ 9
testCases.testOut:
MOST COMPATIBLE DONOR : I
OTHER COMPATIBLE DONORS :
H
G
F
E
D
C
B
A
W

testCases.title: No compatible donors
testCases.testIn:
3
BOMB B+ 90
BANG B+ 85
BOOM B+ 80
A+ 75

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn:
3
BOMB B+ 90
BANG B+ 85
BOOM B+ 80
AB 75

data.constraints: [[n]] is between 0 and 30. There will always only be 1 most compatible donor
data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read name:word(90) bloodType:word(90) age:int
read bloodType:word(90) age:int
write NO DONOR AVAILABLE / NO COMPATIBLE DONOR
or
MOST COMPATIBLE DONOR: AGE
OTHER COMPATIBLE DONORS :
BLABLABLA
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> [[n]]
<<Next [[n]] Lines:>> [[name]], [[blood_type]],[[age]] separated by space
<<Next Line:>> [[blood_type]] [[age]] of patient
data.outputDescription:
Either "NO COMPATIBLE DONORS" or "NO DONOR AVAILABLE" or:
MOST COMPATIBLE DONOR : ___________
OTHER COMPATIBLE DONORS :
__________
__________
__________ ...

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given n donors, and the blood_type and age of the patient, you must print the Most Compatible Donor and Other Compatible Donors

Notes:
Compatible donors most have the same blood group as the patient
Most Compatible Donor is the person with least age difference with the patient and is a compatible donor
Other Compatible Donors should be sorted by absolute difference with patient's age.
Input
Line 1: n
Next n Lines: name, blood_type,age separated by space
Next Line: blood_type age of patient
Output
Either "NO COMPATIBLE DONORS" or "NO DONOR AVAILABLE" or:
MOST COMPATIBLE DONOR : ___________
OTHER COMPATIBLE DONORS :
__________
__________
__________ ...
Constraints
n is between 0 and 30. There will always only be 1 most compatible donor
Example
Input
5
Johnathan A+ 35
Lord.Jay O+ 43
OLDman B+ 78
YOUNGkid A+ 13
Terminator B+ 50
A+ 14
Output
MOST COMPATIBLE DONOR : YOUNGkid
OTHER COMPATIBLE DONORS :
Johnathan
